home.about-us-text: We are a group of engineering students from the University of Minho based in the city of Guimarães (Azurém Campus) with a passion for motorsport. As the latest addition to the Formula Student scene in Portugal, we aim to deliver a project with a solid foundation and, in the short term, become a reference in the north of the country.
home.why-fs-text: Formula Student gives us students the chance to get a taste of the world of engineering. Building our car requires us to apply all the knowledge we have about our areas of expertise and work with partners that besides supporting our project, can help us improve our methods. This project also aims to develop soft skills like management, communication and team work, all crucial in a top tier engineer.
home.competition-text1: Formula Student is divided in 4 classes:
home.competition-classCV:
CV
Presentation of a car equiped with an internal combustion engine
home.competition-classEV:
EV
Presentation of a car equiped with an electric power unit
home.competition-classDV:
DV
Competiton for cars equiped with a driverless system
home.competition-classCC:
Concept Class
Class aimed for new teams that are still developing their first car
home.competition-events:
The competition is divided into a series of static and dynamic events.
The static events consist of the presentation of the team's business plan, analysis of the costs associated with the team and the assembly of the car and analysis of the car's design from a technical point of view. The dynamic tests aim to test the behavior of the car on the track. They include a skidpad, acceleration test, autocross, endurance test and efficiency test. In these events, points will be awarded to every team's overall score, which will later determine the winning team in each class
home.competition-our-class: FSUMinho will compete in EV class with an electric prototype
home.planet-text: We are commited to a greener future. That's why we chose to equip our car with an electric power unit. The team will also support a circular economy, promoting the reuse of electrical components from portuguese industries in order to reduce e-waste. At least 25% of electronic 'trash' that reaches recycling centers, is still higly reusable. These materials are fundamental to reduce our carbon footprint.
home.fspt23-text: FSUMinho made its debeut in the world of Formula Student competitions at FSPT 2023. Our team competed in Class 2 with a virtual electric prototype. The result of our hard work and dedication was an impressive 2nd place in the overall class ranking. Furthermore, we achieved 1st place in the Business Plan Presentation, 2nd place in Engineering Design, and 5th place in Cost and Manufacturing. Our participation in this event not only demonstrated that we are up to the challenge of competing in Formula Student but also provided us with feedback that will help us perform even better in future competitions.

team.whos-in-charge-text: Leading the team are the team leader and the technical directors. The team leader sets strategic goals and coordinates the entire team's activities. The technical director of the mechanical part focuses on the design and manufacturing of the car's mechanical components, while the technical director of the electrical part is responsible for the development and implementation of the electrical systems that control it.

mnt.title: Sector's role
mnt.text: The management sector handles the business side of the team. It is its responsibility to gather funds for the project via partnerships and also for its marketing. Management also has to fulfil the needs of the other departments. This includes ordering parts and tools or provide trainning sessions.
mnt.head: Head of Management

pwrt.title: Sector's role
pwrt.text: The powertrain sector is responsible for the development of the power unit. It's the sector's duty to deliver a reliable and powerful electric motor. Efficiency is also key in this sector. The power unit needs to be tuned in such a way that it is always consuming the right amount of energy.
pwrt.head: Head of Powertrain

esw.title: Sector's role
esw.text: As the name suggests, the electronics & software sector handles all the electronic components and software that keep the car safe and running smoothly. The sector makes sure all the major components of the car are properly programmed and communicating between each other.
esw.head: Head of ESW

dvrt.title: Sector's role
dvrt.text: The drivetrain sector focuses on delivering power from the engine to the wheels. It aims to achieve the most efficient power transfer in order to secure maximum acceleration and maintain speed for the full race distance.
dvrt.head: Head of Sector

suspension_steering.title: Sector's role
suspension_steering.text: The suspension & steering sector is essential for the car's performance. The suspension provides grip, stability, and absorbs track irregularities, while the steering allows the driver to control the car with precision.
suspension_steering.head: Head of Sector

chassis_aero.title: Sector's role
chassis_aero.text: The chassis and aerodynamics sector is responsible for designing and constructing the car's chassis. The chassis is the structure that supports all the car's components. Aerodynamics is responsible for minimizing air resistance and maximizing downforce.
chassis_aero.head: Head of Sector

partners.title: Institutional Partners
partners.text: FSUMinho currently has partnerships established with several student associations from different courses of the University of Minho. These partnerships allow the integration of our project in the academic community and the promotion of activities organized by the partner associations.

form.title: Get in touch
form.thanks:
Thank you for your message
We will get back to you as soon as possible

invest.title: Work with us
invest.why-text: We are more than a group of students with a passion for motorsport. FSUMinho represents the first step in the formation of top engineers. Our members will enter the job market with experience and skills that will make them stand out. We want to offer students the chance of being part of a group that values everyone's work and pushes all members to show their full potential. Investing in our project means investing in the next generation of engineers and making sure that they gather as much experience as possible so that some day in the future they make a difference and push technology foward.
invest.monetary-text: Motorsport isn't cheap at all. Expenses start accumulating in the development of the car and can reach a great ammount when we start competing. Supporting our project finacially helps us manage all the expences all reach our goals.
invest.materials-text: In order to build the car that we are designing, we'll need to gather various materials. Supplying materials to the team helps us take the car from the modeling software to the race track.
invest.knowledge-text: Even though we consider ourselves very skilled and talented, knowledge is never enough. We are always open to learn from actual professionals from our areas of expertise.
invest.pack-partner-text: Partners will benefit from divulgation of their brands via social media campaigns and their logos will be present in our car.
invest.pack-partner-expetations: We expect our partners to also divulge our brand and help us establish useful contacts.
invest.pack-bronze-text: Bronze sponsors will have a spot in our sponsor portfolio. They will have their logo present in the car in more visible parts of the bodywork and merchandising items. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-bronze-expetations: Bronze sponsorship requires an investment between 1000€ and 5000€
invest.pack-silver-text: Silver sponsors will have VIP status in events organized by FSUMinho. Their logo will also be present on the car and merchandising, but will have more presence than bronze logos. This tier will receive a monthly report containing everything done by the team. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-silver-expetations: Silver sponsorship requires an investment between 5000€ and 7500€
invest.pack-gold-text: Gold sponsors will have voting power in decision-making sessions. Their logo presence will be bigger compared to silver sponsors. The team will mention their company in press articles or scientific magazines. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-gold-expetations: Gold sponsorship requires an investment between 7500€ and 12500€
invest.pack-diamond-text: Diamond sponsors will receive the highest level of visibility on the bodywork and in our merchandising. Additionally, they will have the opportunity to collaborate with the team on an annual project. Lower tier benefits are also included.
invest.pack-diamond-expetations: Diamond sponsorship requires an investment of 12500€ or more
